fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Create Licorice Bomb**: Each night, you can create a Licorice Bomb and plant it on a player. This bomb will detonate the following night, killing anyone who visits the targeted player. You can only have one Licorice Bomb active at a time.
- **Masquerade**: Choose one person each night and pose as their role, fooling any investigative abilities that target you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - During Tuesday and Friday, **Licorice Bombs** become even deadlier, killing everyone who visits the target player.
